name: Virtual Fighting Championship (VFC)
description: If you like VR Fighting, you will like this game. If you love showing off your skills and moves, you will love this game. If you have a friend in VR, this game will be essential. Come and join the ring to fight against another real player to a battle of Virtual Fighting!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Newer Processor: Intel i7-7700 HQ, or equivalent AMD Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, Or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2500 MB available space Sound Card: Not important Additional Notes: Cable connection (wifi signal will result in poor performance)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3000 MB available space Sound Card: Have a good one Additional Notes: You will need a good game controller - your body :) ENJOY VFC BOYS AND GIRLS
